briefTitle: AMG 162 in the Treatment of Bone Loss in Subjects Undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate AMG 162 in the Treatment of Bone Loss in Subjects Undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer
summary: This study will evaluate AMG 162 in the treatment of bone loss in subjects undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer.

primaryOutcome.measure: Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
